aesthetic: Technical elegance, minimal, calm, premium developer tools
description: Design tokens for Flow Studio - AI design agents platform. Cool-neutral palette, high readability, strong contrast, confident minimalism. Designed for design-conscious developers and technical product builders.

primary.comment: Slate - primary brand color. Professional, technical, cool-neutral. Slate-700 for headings, slate-600 for body text.

accent.comment: Blue - accent color for CTAs, links, interactive elements. Blue-600 for primary actions, blue-500 for hover states.

neutral.comment: Stone - warm neutral palette for backgrounds and subtle elements. Warmer than pure gray, adds approachability without sacrificing professionalism.

semantic.comment: Semantic colors for states and feedback. Strong enough for visibility, professional tone.

heading.rationale: Inter - designed specifically for screens with excellent readability at all sizes. Slightly geometric but warm. Variable font with precise weight control. Perfect for Flow Studio's technical elegance and clarity values.

body.rationale: Inter for body maintains typographic consistency. Highly readable at text sizes, professional without being sterile. OpenType features for improved legibility.

fonts.comment: Single-font system (Inter) for consistency and performance. Differentiation through weight and size, not font family. Very developer-tool aesthetic (Linear, Vercel approach).

scale.comment: Type scale with 1.25 ratio above base. Base is 16px for optimal readability. Hero sizes (4xl-6xl) for landing page impact.

lineHeight.comment: Headings use 'tight' (1.25) for impact and density control. Body uses 'relaxed' (1.625) for comfortable reading.

letterSpacing.comment: Large headings use 'tight' (-0.025em) for refined look. Body and UI text use 'normal'. All-caps labels use 'wide' (0.025em).

weights.comment: Regular (400) for body, medium (500) for emphasis, semibold (600) for subheadings, bold (700) for primary headings.

values.comment: 4px base scale for precise control. Calm-medium density means 48-96px section padding. More refined than luxury 8px scale, but still generous.

borderRadius.comment: Subtle radii for modern but not trendy feel. 'md' (6px) for buttons and inputs, 'lg' (8px) for cards. Not fully sharp (technical) but not overly rounded (playful).

shadows.comment: Subtle shadows - minimal elevation. 'sm' for cards on hover, 'focus' for keyboard navigation (blue outline), 'focus-subtle' for form inputs (lighter focus ring). Confident minimalism means restrained shadow use.

breakpoints.comment: Mobile-first breakpoints. Standard modern responsive design.

duration.comment: Subtle motion tolerance. Use 'fast' for button hovers, 'medium' for focus states, 'slow' for layout shifts.

easing.comment: Use 'default' (ease-in-out) for most transitions. Smooth-fade style from brand config.

notes.colorRationale: Slate and blue create technical elegance without coldness. Slate is more refined than pure gray, blue provides confidence and capability. Cool-neutral temperature aligns with brand. All pairings exceed WCAG AAA for strong readability - critical for developer tools.
notes.typographyRationale: Inter-only system for consistency and performance. Designed for screens, variable weights, excellent legibility. Single font family is very developer-tool aesthetic (matches Linear, Vercel references). Differentiation through weight/size, not font switching.
notes.spacingRationale: 4px base scale provides precision. Calm-medium density achieved through 48-96px section padding. More controlled than luxury 8px scale. Generous without feeling sparse - respects information density needs of technical audience.
notes.interactionRationale: Subtle hover states (color shift, minimal shadow) signal interactivity without playfulness. Blue focus rings meet accessibility while reinforcing brand. Smooth-fade motion (150-250ms) with cubic-bezier easing feels confident and precise. All animations respect prefers-reduced-motion.
